description: This file defines the application configuration settings class for a JIRA middleware control server project. It loads environment variables using pydantic-settings, specifies configuration parameters related to JIRA API access, retries, custom fields, and general app settings. It also provides a singleton accessor for the settings instance.

classes.name: Settings
classes.description: Application configuration loaded from environment variables, with fields for JIRA integration, retry policies, custom field names, and app general settings.

methods.name: __init__(self, **data)
methods.description: Initializes Settings instance, pre-processing environment variables for API keys, CORS origins, and default board ID.

methods.name: Optional[str] jira_base_url(self)
methods.description: Property resolving the base URL for JIRA access, either from explicit setting or derived from cloud site.
